biotools.summary: Locate genomic signatures using an exact k-mer matching strategy while accommodating k-mer mismatches. The software identifies sequences that are sufficiently represented within inclusion targets and sufficiently absent from exclusion targets. The signature discovery process is accomplished using probabilistic models instead of heuristic strategies.

bioschemas.name: Neptune
